message.content:
A standard pool table size is 8 feet by 4 feet, with a playing surface measuring approximately 92 inches long and 46 inches wide. There are other sizes available as well:

- Bar-size tables (7-foot) measure around 78 inches by 39 inches for the playing area.
- Professional or tournament-sized tables (9-foot) have a playing area of approximately 100 inches by 50 inches.

These dimensions may vary slightly depending on the manufacturer, but these are generally accepted measurements for standard pool tables.
